original_title: 工藤新一 京都新撰組殺人事件
overview: Kudo Shinichi and Mori Ran are invited to the set of a jidaigeki in Kyoto. On their airplane ride to Kyoto, a murder mystery arises. As well, when they finally reach the set in Kyoto, they become involved in another murder mystery. Will Kudo Shinichi be able to solve the mystery?…
title: Detective Conan: Shinichi Kudo and the Kyoto Shinsengumi Murder Case
